name: Memes
author: Crobat
Espeon
Arcanine
Fate Testarossa
Amane Ohtori
summary: It's a clash of popular memes uniquely created in PO mafia! (This is mainly just another fun theme made to be played only on game night.) Tips have been added so read them so you can kind of maybe possibly almost somewhat understand how to play. NEW ROLES: Village V Town and Miki Productions!

sides.winmsg: ~Players~ have saved the mafia channel and protected its many memes!
±Crobat: My syndrome lives on through ~Players~, and there is no cure for it!
±Meh: Did you fools really think you could stop ~Players~, the ultimatum? >xU
The insane and reckless playstyle of ~Players~ was too much for anyone to handle!
They had been looked down upon before, but now they stand above the rest. ~Players~ have ejechted their opponents! Who's the one making puns now?
±Kland: Mere mortals will never be able to defeat the greatest mafia player ever! All hail ~Players~, the true mafia god!

±~Players~: Thank you, thank you everyone! You have all been the greatest audience Miki Productions could ever ask for! ~Player~ takes a bow and walks off to create more mafia themes with coding errors in them!

roles.help: You are the all-powerful legendary top threat! Your power is so scary that you have absolutely no special commands or abilities outside of voting!
roles.info: ~Sided~

roles.help: You are TraceofLife and apparently, you sux at everything! However, you are determined to be the hero of the village! For this reason, you are able to /kill one person during the day without being revealed! However, you can only daykill your teammates; any mafia role will evade your daykill!
roles.info: Can kill one person during the standby (user is not revealed). All mafia roles evade these daykills. ~Sided~

lynch.convertmsg: ~Target~ (Flooder Rager) has lost control due to the lynching of a power role! His rage now allows him to kill a second person at night!

kill.msg: Time to make a play! Use /kill to kill someone without revealing yourself! Remember that all mafia roles will evade your kills!
kill.killmsg: TraceofLife appears out of nowhere, and instantly kills ~Target~ because they sux!

roles.help: You are VirajVora, known for your ellipses! You are able to use the following commands at night three times a game: /kill, /distract, /inspect, /protect, /poison, and /safeguard. You can also /expose during the day three times a game, /inspect during the day three times a game, and /kill during the day three times a game. Any person you use a night command on will know that you visited them (as in your role, not your actual username)! Lastly, none of your day commands will reveal you.
roles.info: Can use all of the following commands three times a game during the night: kill, distract, inspect, protect, poison, and safeguard (target will know they were visited by this role). Can kill, inspect, and expose three times a game during the standby (user is not revealed). ~Sided~

lynch.convertmsg: ~Target~ (Flooder Rager) has lost control due to the lynching of a power role! His rage now allows him to kill a second person at night!

kill.msg: You can /kill someone once a game without revealing yourself!

inspect.msg: You can also /inspect someone once a game to figure out their role! This will only be known to you!

expose.msg: You can even /expose someone once a game to reveal their role to everyone!

roles.help: Formerly known as Ghengars Khan, you are tired of the village failing and have decided to take matters into your own hands! Deliver justice to your opponents with /kill every night! If a power role (besides yourself) is lynched, you will be revealed and die after the next night, but will be able to kill a second person, outspeeding bodyguards and distractors!
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. If a power role is lynched, will die after the following night but can kill a second person, outspeeding bodyguards and distractors. ~Sided~

roles.help: Now they've done it! With the lynching of a fellow power role, your rage has overpowered you! In addition to your /kill, you can now /rage at a second person to kill them as well! This kill (/rage) outspeeds bodyguards and distractors! However, since you're flooding the chat with your rage, you're going to be kicked and muted (aka die) once the night ends.

poison.poisonDeadMessage: Looks like your rage got the best of you, as you were kicked and muted for flood. Hopefully it was worth it!

rage.msg: You were the target of Flooder Rager's madness. You never even stood a chance.
rage.dummybroadcastmsg: ±Blaziken: ~Self~ was kicked and muted for 1 hour for flood.

roles.help: Since you're so skilled at this game, you already know you're a miller! Since Last Aizawa is in the same boat as you, you both know each other from the start and can talk to each other using /tt.
roles.info: Reveals as any mafia role (except for Mumu and her different forms) when inspected. Knows Last Aizawa. ~Sided~

roles.help: Since you're so skilled at this game, you already know you're a miller! Since First Aizawa is in the same boat as you, you both know each other from the start and can talk to each other using /tt.
roles.info: Reveals as any mafia role (except for Mumu and her different forms) when inspected. Knows First Aizawa. ~Sided~

roles.help: Your meta is to give everyone a taste of their own medicine! This means that if anyone inspects you, you will inspect them back (identify them)! If anyone kills you, whether it be at night or day, you will kill them back! Lastly, if you are lynched, you will kill everyone that voted for you!
roles.info: Identifies inspectors. Revenges nightkills and daykills. If lynched, kills everyone that voted for them. ~Sided~

inspect.msg: ~Target~ inspected you, so you inspected them back! ~Target~ is the ~Role~!

kill.msg: Looks like you killed the Mirror. Your attack was reflected right back at you.

actions.daykillrevengemsg: ~Target~ attacks ~Self~, but their kill was reflected right back at them!

killVoters.message: Nice job lynching the Mirror. Those that voted for ~Self~ have all been lynched in return!

lynch.convertmsg: ~Target~ (Flooder Rager) has lost control due to the lynching of a power role! His rage now allows him to kill a second person at night!

roles.help: Looks like you're the pun of the village. Don't be fooled though, as people shouldn't take you for granted. If anyone tries to lynch you, you will objecht to that decision and remain in the game! (You can't be lynched.)
roles.info: Can't be lynched (user is revealed each time they survive a lynch). ~Sided~

lynch.convertmsg: ~Self~ (Objechtion) objechted to the lynch and their objechtion wasn't rejechted, so all the votes on ~Self~ were ejechted!

roles.help: You are the original bad mannered role. You can /visit one person during the night to reveal your role to them, but you won't know what their role is! Sounds pretty bad mannered, but that's all right because if you die, you will reveal the roles of all the people you visited!
roles.info: Can visit one person during the night to reveal their role to them. Upon dying, reveals the roles of all people this role visited. ~Sided~

lynch.convertmsg: ~Target~ (Flooder Rager) has lost control due to the lynching of a power role! His rage now allows him to kill a second person at night!

onDeath.exposemsg: How bad mannered of you to let me die! Well then, as I go, I just want everyone to know that I visited ~Target~ and they turned out to be the ~Role~!

visit.dummytargetmsg: Well hello there! It's ~Self~, the BM! Won't you tell me your role? It would be pretty bad mannered of you not to!

roles.help: Wait, you're not a virus, you're just the bone marrow! Not sure how someone could mess that up, but oh well. You are able to /safeguard up to three people every night to protect them from distractors and inspectors!
roles.info: Can safeguard three people during the night. ~Sided~

lynch.convertmsg: ~Target~ (Flooder Rager) has lost control due to the lynching of a power role! His rage now allows him to kill a second person at night!

roles.help: You are the master scumhunter! Your superior scumhunting abilities allow you to /expose someone's role during the day without revealing yourself!
roles.info: Can expose one person during the standby (user is not revealed). ~Sided~

lynch.convertmsg: ~Target~ (Flooder Rager) has lost control due to the lynching of a power role! His rage now allows him to kill a second person at night!

expose.msg: Time to put those scumhunting abilities to use! Type /expose to reveal someone's role without revealing yourself!
expose.exposemsg: A loud voice echoes throughout the mafia channel. '~Target~, ARE YOU THE ~Role~?' 'I...I guess so...' ~Target~ nervously responds.

roles.help: You have no special commands, but that's just the way you like it! You're known for attempting to assist your fellow village in eliminating the mafia, but ultimately (and sometimes unintentionally) end up working against them! For this reason, you will win with any and all sides and win if all the other village roles have been eliminated (even though you're on their side and are supposed to be helping them).
roles.info: Wins with any side as long as it survives. Wins if all other village roles die. ~Sided~

onDeadRoles.convertmsg: All of the village roles have been eliminated! ~Self~ is victorious and has won the game! SIEG HEIL TOWN!

roles.help: You have no special commands, but that's just the way you like it! You're known for attempting to assist your fellow village in eliminating the mafia, but ultimately (and sometimes unintentionally) end up working against them! For this reason, you will win with any and all sides and win if all the other village roles have been eliminated (even though you're on their side and are supposed to be helping them).
roles.info: Wins with any side as long as it survives. Wins if all other village roles die. ~Sided~

roles.help: With every other village role eliminated, you have now won! You are now immune to everything! You can no longer vote, but who cares about that? YOU ARE A WINNER!
roles.info: Can't vote. Immune to everything and wins the game with any side. ~Sided~

kill.msg: Trying to kill me after I've already won? That won't work at all. What a noob!

poison.msg: Trying to poison me after I've already won? That won't work at all. What a noob!

convert.msg: Trying to convert me after I've already won? That won't work at all. What a noob!

roles.help: You are the disorder that causes a mafia role to always crossfire. As a result, you can /kill every night, but can only kill other mafia roles; any role from the village will evade your kill except for the Mirror, since you always seems to find a way to hit the bomb. Luckily, you can just lynch anyone that happens to evade your kill with your vote of 999. Furthermore, the 'selfvote to find kuja' strategy won't work because you also have a voteshield of -9999.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. All village roles except for Mirror evade these kills. Vote of 999. Voteshield of -9999. ~Sided~

kill.msg: You have become another victim of Crobat Syndrome.

roles.help: Yer, you're the god of mafia known as kland! You can eliminate your foolish opponents with /kill every night. You can also fake expose someone (including yourself) as any role without revealing yourself; this will reveal your target's real role to you and only you! Lastly, since you're so manipulative and can easily gain support, you have a vote of 3.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can fake-expose someone (including self) as any role; this works as an inspect for the user. Vote of 3. ~Sided~

kill.msg: God has sentenced you to death.

top.msg: You can now type the first three letters of a role's name to fake expose someone as that role! This won't reveal you, and it will reveal the target's real role to you and only you! (You will need to type 4 letters if you want to fake expose someone as VirajVora'd or Virus.)

roles.help: Poor you. You're just an overused pun that has been taken for granted, but you've had enough. You can /kill one person every night to teach them a lesson, and these kills will be broadcasted to the public so everyone knows you mean business. Furthermore, if you are lynched, you will randomly kill one person that voted for you.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night (broadcasted to the public at the end of the night). If lynched, randomly kills one person that voted for them. ~Sided~

killVoters.message: ±~Self~: I won't go down without a fight! GET REJECHTED, ~Target~!

roles.help: You're known for using a bunch of mafia alts, but now you can change into a few of them! Type /yuna, /misa, /sule, or /sk to change into Yunalesca, Misa Amane, Suleika, or Skull Kid! Until then, you can only /kill one person every night.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can change into Yunalesca, Misa Amane, Suleika, or Skull Kid. ~Sided~

kill.msg: So many alts...far too many for you to take. Now you're dead.

yuna.convertmsg: Mumu changed names and is now known as Yunalesca.

misa.convertmsg: Mumu changed names and is now known as Misa Amane.

sule.convertmsg: Mumu changed names and is now known as Suleika.

sk.convertmsg: Mumu changed names and is now known as Skull Kid.

roles.help: You are now Yunalesca from the FF mafia theme! You can /distract one person every night in addition to the /kill shared with your team; you also have a vote of 2. You can still type /misa, /sule, or /sk to change into Misa Amane, Suleika, or Skull Kid.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can distract one person during the night. Vote of 2. Can change into Misa Amane, Suleika, or Skull Kid. ~Sided~

kill.msg: Hey, it's Yunalesca! Wait, that's not a good thing is it? (Nope, it's not, and now you're dead.)

misa.convertmsg: Yunalesca changed names and is now known as Misa Amane.

sule.convertmsg: Yunalesca changed names and is now known as Suleika.

sk.convertmsg: Yunalesca changed names and is now known as Skull Kid.

roles.help: You are now Misa Amane from the DN mafia theme! You can no longer kill, but you can /distract one person every night. You can also /inspect one person every night, and your vote is 1.1! You can still type /yuna, /sule, or /sk to change into Yunalesca, Suleika, or Skull Kid.
roles.info: Can distract one person during the night. Can inspect one person during the night. Vote of 1.1. Can change into Yunalesca, Suleika, or Skull Kid. ~Sided~

yuna.convertmsg: Misa Amane changed names and is now known as Yunalesca.

sule.convertmsg: Misa Amane changed names and is now known as Suleika.

sk.convertmsg: Misa Amane changed names and is now known as Skull Kid.

roles.help: You are now Suleika from the MM mafia theme! In addition to your team's /kill, you can /shroud two people every night (including yourself) to block inspectors, distractors, poison, and stalk! You can /expose someone during the day to learn what their role is, and you counter all daykills! You can still type /yuna, /misa, or /sk to change into Yunalesca, Misa Amane, or Skull Kid.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can shroud (safeguard) two people during the night. Can expose (inspect) one person during the standby. Counters daykills. Can change into Yunalesca, Misa Amane, or Skull Kid. ~Sided~

actions.daykillrevengemsg: ~Target~ tried to attack Suleika, but got lost in her labyrinth and never came back!

expose.msg: You can /expose anyone to learn their role!
expose.exposemsg: Suleika descends into the darkness surrounding ~Target~!

kill.msg: *** Not all who wish rejoice!

yuna.convertmsg: Suleika changed names and is now known as Yunalesca.

misa.convertmsg: Suleika changed names and is now known as Misa Amane.

sk.convertmsg: Suleika changed names and is now known as Skull Kid.

roles.help: You are now Skull Kid from the Zelda mafia theme! Along with your team's /kill, you will reveal as a Top Threat when inspected! Additionally, you can't be haxed, distracted, or daykilled, and will change into Majora's Wrath if you are lynched! You can still type /yuna, /misa, or /sule to change into Yunalesca, Misa Amane, or Suleika.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can't be detected by spies. Ignores distract. Evades daykills. Converts to Majora's Wrath if lynched. Reveals as Top Threat if inspected. Can change into Yunalesca, Misa Amane, or Suleika. ~Sided~

lynch.convertmsg: The Majora's Mask falls from ~Self~'s face and gains a humanoid shape, becoming its ultimate form, the Majora's Wrath!

kill.msg: You were unfortunate enough to run into someone with a thick skull. They didn't spare you any mercy.

yuna.convertmsg: Skull Kid changed names and is now known as Yunalesca.

misa.convertmsg: Skull Kid changed names and is now known as Misa Amane.

sule.convertmsg: Skull Kid changed names and is now known as Suleika.

roles.help: With your transformation, you can no longer change alts or forms. You can still /kill at night, but this kill now pierces protection! You still can't be haxed or distracted, but you no longer evade daykills.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night (pierces protection). Can't be detected by spies. Ignores distract. ~Sided~

kill.msg: The wrath of the mask has no mercy.

You can still type /yuna, /misa, or /sule to change into Yunalesca, Misa Amane, or Suleika.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can't be detected by spies. Ignores distract. Evades daykills. Converts to Majora's Wrath if lynched. Reveals as Top Threat if inspected. Can change into Yunalesca, Misa Amane, or Suleika. ~Sided~

lynch.convertmsg: The Majora's Mask falls from ~Self~'s face and gains a humanoid shape, becoming its ultimate form, the Majora's Wrath!

kill.msg: You were unfortunate enough to run into someone with a thick skull. They didn't spare you any mercy.

yuna.convertmsg: Skull Kid changed names and is now known as Yunalesca.

misa.convertmsg: Skull Kid changed names and is now known as Misa Amane.

sule.convertmsg: Skull Kid changed names and is now known as Suleika.

roles.help: You are now Misa Amane from the DN mafia theme! You can no longer kill, but you can /distract one person every night. You can also /inspect one person every night, and your vote is 1.1! You can still type /yuna, /sule, or /sk to change into Yunalesca, Suleika, or Skull Kid.

roles.help: You are now Suleika from the MM mafia theme! In addition to your team's /kill, you can /shroud two people every night (including yourself) to block inspectors, distractors, and poison! You can /expose someone during the day to learn what their role is, and you counter all daykills! You can still type /yuna, /misa, or /sk to change into Yunalesca, Misa Amane, or Skull Kid.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can shroud (safeguard) two people during the night. Can expose (inspect) one person during the standby. Counters daykills. Can change into Yunalesca, Misa Amane, or Skull Kid. ~Sided~

roles.help: The greatest and most powerful creation of Meh, you are the one and only ultimatum. You can /kill one person every night, and this has a 50% chance to pierce protection! You can also /protect yourself (or anyone else) every night, but this only has a 50% chance of working. Lastly, you can /mark one person every night. If you die, every person that you marked will die as well!

roles.help: Known for your somewhat obvious but insane playstyle, you are able to /kill one person every night and /inspect another! Since you're so obvious though, everyone will know who you are killing as well as who you are inspecting, and you won't be able to change your targets! If you are lynched, you will survive it and gain an additional vote as well as a -1 voteshield. Just to make sure no one can stop your rampage, you can't be distracted!
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night (broadcasted to everyone). Can inspect one person during the night (broadcasted to everyone). Ignores distract. Survives 1 lynch (vote increases to 2 and gains a -1 voteshield after that). ~Sided~

killusermsg: *** You have become a forgotten mafia meme! ***
lynchmsg: ~Player~ has resigned from mafia, and takes their famous ~Role~ meme along with them!
drawmsg: Looks like there is only one meme that rules them all. 'Everybody died! This is why we can't have nice things :('
tips: VirajVora'd: You are the most important role of the village. You will have to lay low and work from the shadows to secure your team's victory. If you die, the village's chances of winning plummet.

Exposes: If someone is VirajVora'd, that is always a REAL expose. If someone 'nervously responds', that is always a REAL expose. If you see 'mere mortals, heed my decree', those exposes are always FAKED.
Millers: Skull Kid reveals as Top Threat. First Aizawa and Last Aizawa reveal as any mafia role (except for Mumu and her other forms).
Hax: The only role that gets hax is Fired Espeon (a mafia role), and he gets a LOT of it. Be wary that switching targets too often (whether village or mafia) will allow him to hax you.
Voting: Berserk survives one lynch and gains a vote of 2 and a -1 voteshield. God has a vote of 3. Yunalesca has a vote of 2. Misa Amane has a vote of 1.1.
Lynches: Objechtion (a village role) can't be lynched and is revealed each time they survive a lynch. Rejechted (a mafia role) randomly kills one person that voted for them if they are lynched.
changelog: 6/7/2015: New roles (Miki Productions, Village V Town) have been added!
